name: Voxprotocol
0:
”Alexa open Vox Protocol”
”Alexa launch Vox Protocol”
”Alexa start Vox Protocol”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vox protocol
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Voxprotocol for Alexa skill gets you the latest corporate updates along with an intro list and blueprint for our amazing new Echo and Fire TV device release titles and schedule. You will also learn about our exclusive free to join Beta testing opportunities as well. All of this from the global leader in voice app entertainment! 

After you enable our Echo device skill you can ask Alexa questions like:
“Alexa, ask Vox Protocol what their new releases are?” - To get a heads up about our upcoming Echo device voice apps
“Alexa, ask Vox Protocol what their Mission is?” - To learn more about what our overall goal is
“Alexa, ask Vox Protocol who their CEO is?” to find out more about the person who guides the ship

We are constantly updating and improving all of our Alexa skills and value our user's input! So if you have a comment, suggestion, question or just want to say, "Hey!" please reach out to us at Alexa@voxprotocol.com

Feedback and Connect:
We are also super active and available to answer questions or find new friends on the socials at: 

https://twitter.com/Voxprotocol

or:

https://www.facebook.com/Voxprotocol
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
